feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable major update from actions by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14956
  • Remove TABLES_DEFAULT_ADMIN flag by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14953
  • Support setting multiple many to many relationships between two tables by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14966
  • further AI config updates for case where there's no configuration by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14965
  • fix for conditional automation step options always showing by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14968

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.0.3...3.0.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Changes to support processing bindings on both sides of branch condition evaluation by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14787
  • Add new bindings to drawer by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14892
  • Fix wrongly removing valueType=binding by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14927
  • Search filter typing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14922
  • Fix issue with branch step bindings by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14946
  • Automation Branching UX by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14783

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.0.4...3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Self host feature flags by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14976

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.1.0...3.1.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Log SQS connection errors, and retry connection a few times before giving up. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.1.1...3.1.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove watchtower by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14989
  • Issue where looping wasn't working due to missing context by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14991

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.1.2...3.1.3
